name: ∞NEXT ASIAN E-SPORT CENTER
description:
3rd Place winner of ACYA E-Sports Centre Design Challenge (Corporate Category)

E-sports has risen dramatically in their popularity especially when pandemic hits, However, health is critical issue in e-sport due to the novelty of the field and the way in which it is played in order to counteract the health concern, the concept of this e-sport center originates from a ‘path’ – a journey retracing the practice of sports. Benchmark against other surrounding sports facilities, it draws from tradition of the past in the context of the present of created a space for the future.
